TopicTitle: Map a button to center a build in the VAB?

Articles.Content: Sometimes, I build big first to see the whole picture before I break a build into liftable segments . sections. When you get busy moving things around and trying to see from different points of view or move the whole build up or down to attach something, the build ends up getting moved off center of the "Circle" map on the floor. I spend much time trying to get them moved back. A keyboard command to automatically center the build in the target circle would go a long way. Not a priority, more a nuisance removal.

Yup...this was suggested a month or so ago. There should be a "key mapping" sticky dedicated to things people would like to be able to map.

Definitely vehicle centering would be welcomed by the majority of players. Especially on MEGA-builds, it would just make things easier to deal with.
